title: Chocolate fudge trifle
ingredients: ['1 chocolate Swiss roll', '1 tub ready made custard', '1/2 block milk cooking chocolate', '50g dark chocolate', '50g butter', '80g caster sugar', '1 dessertspoon golden syrup', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1 punnet strawberries', '1 teaspoon Kirsh or similar liqueur', '1 tub double cream', '1 packet chocolate sprinkles']
